name: Gossip Erosion Sensor
description: Detects when information flows shift from constructive storytelling to destructive gossip, leading to erosion of education, cooperation, and trust.
mechanism: Monitors narrative repetition for distortion and sensational bias
Tracks trust-energy loss across groups (students, coworkers, citizens)
Flags when cooperative capacity declines due to gossip-driven distrust

storytelling_outward: Narrative builds shared education or moral insight
gossip_inward: Narrative reduces cooperation and increases suspicion
